headline: Evaluating eBay (EBAY) After New Ad Tools And Exclusive Auto Parts Partnership
summary: Why eBay stock is back in focus eBay (EBAY) has caught investor attention after two recent moves: exclusive marketplace access to CarParts.com’s Evan Fischer brand and fresh marketing tools that add video and comparison features to promoted listings. See our latest analysis for eBay. These product moves come as eBay’s share price sits at US$86.52, with a 7 day share price return of an 8.36% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of 30.14%, suggesting longer term holders have seen...
